name: Birthday Balloons
description:
Birthday Balloons is fun for kids and adults of all ages! Pop as many balloons as you can! High Score wins! You're never too old to play! Use your finger to pop as many balloons as you can. 6 games in 1! Each game has 4 skill levels! High Score Wins!

How many balloons can you pop?

Games 1 - 6:

1). All Pop - Regular - pop all the balloons as they fall. If you miss 3 balloons, game is over.

2). All Pop - One Shot - pop all the balloons as they fall, if you miss 1 balloon, game is over.

3.) Single - Regular - pop the balloons of a specific color. If you pop 3 balloons of the wrong color, game is over.

4.) Single - One Shot - pop the balloons of a specific color. If you pop 1 balloon of the wrong color, game is over.

5.) Mixed - Regular - pop the balloons of a specific color that changes at random. If you pop 3 balloons of the wrong color, game is over.

6.) Mixed - One Shot - pop the balloons of a specific color that changes at random. If you pop 1 balloon of the wrong color, game is over.

High Score Wins!

Good Luck!


* If you like this app, please write a review and also share this app with your friends and family on Facebook and Twitter. Thank you.

** If you have ideas on how to make this app better, or If you are experiencing technical problems with this app, please don't write a review, but instead contact us by pressing the "App Support" button located in the Information screen.
